transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji. Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan hello. This call is now being recorded.
Customer: Haan ji. Haan ji haan ji. Ashutosh Pandey baat kar raha hu. Abhi aapne yahi phone kiya tha na?
Customer: Haan, maine call kiya tha, bataiye.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. System mein hai kya abhi?
Customer: Haan, system mein baitha hu.
Executive: Theek hai, mail open kar lijiye sir aap.
Customer: Mail open karna hai? Accha ji, ek minute ji.

Customer: Kar liya.
Executive: Dekhiye aapko invitation gaya hoga ek IndiaMART se Ashutosh Pandey ke naam se.

Customer: Accha ye aapne bheja hai?
Executive: Hmm. To aap ek baat bataiye, ye lead jo hai isme payment pehle se dikha raha hai jab payment ho gaya ek saal ke liye usme golden, silver, ye plan hai iska, samajh mein nahi aa raha ki aap logo ka hai.
Executive: Matlab?
Customer: Ye by leads ka jaise hum click karte hain.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To isme aap ek baar wo kariye na, kya bolte hain ki aap meeting join kariye. Main aapko proper tarike se aapki jo A N Enterprises karke jo company hai na, wo uski ho gayi hai, uski service live ho gayi hai ab IndiaMART pe. Theek hai? Ab main aapka account manager Ashutosh Pandey baat kar raha hu. Ab main aapka account handle karunga. Aapko kahin bhi kisi cheez mein dikkat aayegi, aap mere ko phone kariyega. Theek hai? Main aapko dikha dunga aap system pe open kariye. Main aapko pura proper tarike se guide karne wala hu kaise by leads consume karni hai, kaise services proper tarike se use karni hai. Isliye main aapko ek invitation bheja hu. Main aapko phone karne hi wala tha abhi. But main ek dusri meeting mein tha isliye thoda late ho gaya. Usse pehle hi aapne phone kar diya.
Customer: Chaliye koi baat nahi, maafi chahenge uske liye hum, bataiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi, wo main sir hamare paas bhi hota hai na, main aap se connect karne hi wala tha. Abhi wo mam just meeting khatam karke main aap se hi main baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ye maine aapka kar liya, ye join Google Meet kar liya maine.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji, join join kar lijiye.
Customer: Join with Google Meet pe aa gaya.

Executive: Laptop hai sir ya desktop hai?
Customer: Laptop pe hi kar raha hu sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm, aaram se join kariye.
Customer: Ho gaya sir, ask to join likha hua aa gaya, ready to join.
Executive: Haan haan, join kariye.

Executive: Ji, ek baar na ek kaam kariye, uh.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir boliye.
Executive: Ji, ek baar screen share kariye. Jahan se aap camera on karte hain na, uske just bagal mein dekhiye box ke andar upar wali teer bani hai. Uspe click kariye.
Customer: Accha ye teer bana hua hai?
Executive: Haan, uspe share ka option aa raha hoga. Jaise click karenge na, to upar aapke teen aa raha hai kya? Chrome tab, window and entire screen.
Executive: Likha hai na teen? Teen likhe honge, Chrome tab, window, and entire screen.
Customer: Kahan par bata rahe hain aap ye?
Executive: Box ke andar, box ke andar.
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: Ye meet tools bana hua hai usse aana hai?
Executive: Aap ek to system pe dekh rahe hain jahan pe ek mute mute ka option hota hai.
Customer: Haan mute ka hai, theek hai, uske baad video ka hai.
Executive: Video, uske baad kya hai? Box ke andar teer bana hai?
Customer: Haan teer bane hai, share screen.
Executive: Uspe click kariye.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Upar dekhiye teen aa raha hoga, Chrome tab, window aur entire screen.
Customer: Haan aa raha hai aapka. Entire screen pe click kariye.
Customer: Entire screen click kiya?
Customer: Entire screen haan kar diya.
Executive: Ek chhoti si screen ban ke aa rahi hogi. Ek baar screen pe click kariye.
Customer: Screen pe click kar di, kar diya.
Executive: Neeche share ka option aa raha hai?
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Share kar dijiye.
Customer: Share pe click kariye.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Ji, abhi main aapki screen to abhi main aapki screen dekh sakta hu.
Executive: Ji haan, abhi network, I think thoda network issue hai na. Isko cross kar dijiye.
Customer: Isko?
Executive: Nahi nahi, aap ek baar profile pe aaiye, profile pe.
Customer: IndiaMART wali pe?
Executive: Haan, ye show my screen anyway pe click kariye.
Customer: Kahan par hai show my? Show my screen anyway pe click kar dijiye sir. Wahan pe screen pe ban ke aa rahi hogi.
Executive: Likh ke aa raha hai na? Google is sharing your screen.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Isi pe karna hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Ek minute ab line pe. System se hamari baat ho sakti hai na?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: System se baat ho sakti hai hamari?
Customer: Haan ho jayegi.
Executive: Theek hai, to main ye call disconnect kar raha hu, hum system se baat kar lete hain haan. Kar lo aap kar lo system se kar lo. Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to understand the by leads plan.

- Customer is facing issue with payment details.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about the company services.

- Executive offered to guide on using by leads.

- Executive shared an invitation to join a meeting.

- Executive guided to share the screen.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect via system.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, payment, screen sharing, google meet
